title: What are the best books by Pakistani authors? - Quora

response.answer_text: A very unique question about Pakistan. Pakistan is no doubt among the literally weak and anti- art country, because most of the art(Movies, Books, Paintings, Magazines, and Blogs) are always banned for their anti- Islamic elements. Because they tend to social upliftment, and women empoermen(which is pro-islam) , are banned for their truthfulness. But still, world saw some great works from Pakistani Authors… Here are few in my knowledge- The Reluctant Fundamentalist by Mohsin HamidThe Jew is not my enemy by Tarek FatehThe Blind Man's Garden by nadeem aslamI am malala by malala yousufzaiMoth Smoke by mohsin HamidI have read only these 5 books…rest I have no idea…
